hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said to me: 'Say: O Allah, guide me and make me steadfast,' and he forbade me to put a ring on this one and this one" - and Bishr (one of the narrators) pointed to his forefinger and middle finger. And 'Asim said: "One of the two of them

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْخَاتَمِ، فِي السَّبَّابَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Wearing the Ring on the Forefinger
